articles.author: Rob Wile, Steve Kopack
articles.title: Trump terminates trade talks with Canada - NBC News
articles.description: President Donald Trump said Friday that he had terminated trade discussions with Canada, citing an incoming Canadian tax on tech companies including ones based in the U.S..
articles.content:
President Donald Trump said Friday that he had terminated trade discussions with Canada, citing an incoming Canadian tax on tech companies including ones based in the U.S..

articles.title: Apple To Witness A Higher Growth With iPhone 18 Launch In 2026, As Advanced AI Capabilities And A Foldable Flagship Are Elements Missing From The iPhone 17 Series, Resulting In Fewer Sales - Wccftech
articles.description: An investors note reveals that the iPhone 17 lineup will not bring sufficient sales traction, but that momentum could be introduced by the iPhone 18 series
articles.content: There have been a few hiccups with Apples AI features rollout this year, and it could prove deleterious for the companys iPhone 17 sales. Fortunately, we could witness significant growth the next yea… [+2015 chars]
